I've been building a device for the past few months with input from some Pirate and Kmd community members and we have now decided to sell it for ARRR only for a limited period of time.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-prt] <subjectX> It is still in testing phase and we're waiting on feedback and have a security audit in mind as well, but basically the device, Cerberus, is a UTM (unified threat management) that is easy to use by anyone. With an integrated firewall, intrusion detection system, network wide ad/tracker blocking, 1 year free VPN and a TOR port it is as easy to use as connecting it to your internet cable and then connect your devices via LAN or WiFi.
